briefdescription.para: Use a single color and fade the color to totally transparent.
Use colors from a color ramp.
Color sources for the glow.
Returns the blend mode for the effect.

simplesect.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Returns the blur level (strength) for the glow.

simplesect.para: blur level. Value will be between 0 and 16, with larger values indicating greater blur strength.

briefdescription.para: Returns the color for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
This only applies if the colorType() is set to SingleColor. The glow will fade between the specified color and a totally transparent version of the color.
glow color
setColor
colorType

briefdescription.para: Returns the color mode used for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
The glow can either be drawn using a QgsColorRamp color ramp or by specificing a single color.
current color mode used for the glow
setColorType
color
ramp

briefdescription.para: Returns the opacity for the effect.

simplesect.para: opacity value between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque

briefdescription.para: Returns the properties describing the paint effect encoded in a string format.

simplesect.para: string map of properties, in the form property key, value

briefdescription.para: Returns the color ramp used for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
This only applies if the colorType() is set to ColorRamp. The glow will utilize colors from the ramp.
color ramp for glow
setRamp
colorType

briefdescription.para: Reads a string map of an effect's properties and restores the effect to the state described by the properties map.

parameterdescription.para: effect properties encoded in a string map

briefdescription.para: Sets the blend mode for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Sets blur level (strength) for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
This can be used to smooth the output from the glow effect.
level
blur level. Values between 0 and 16 are valid, with larger values indicating greater blur strength.
blurLevel

briefdescription.para: Sets the color for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
This only applies if the colorType() is set to SingleColor. The glow will fade between the specified color and a totally transparent version of the color.
color
glow color
color
setColorType

briefdescription.para: Sets the color mode to use for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
The glow can either be drawn using a QgsColorRamp color ramp or by simply specificing a single color. setColorType is used to specify which mode to use for the glow.
colorType
color type to use for glow
colorType
setColor
setRamp

briefdescription.para: Sets the opacity for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: double between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque

briefdescription.para: Sets the color ramp for the glow.

detaileddescription.para:
This only applies if the colorType() is set to ColorRamp. The glow will utilize colors from the ramp.
ramp
color ramp for glow. Ownership of the ramp is transferred to the effect.
ramp
setColorType

briefdescription.para: Sets the spread distance for drawing the glow effect.

parameterdescription.para: spread distance. Units are specified via setSpreadUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale used for the spread distance.

parameterdescription.para: map unit scale for spread distance

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the glow spread distance.
Returns the spread distance used for drawing the glow effect.

simplesect.para: spread distance. Units are retrieved via spreadUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale used for the spread distance.

simplesect.para: map unit scale for spread distance

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the glow spread distance.
Returns the bounding rect required for drawing the effect.

detaileddescription.para:
This method can be used to expand the bounding rect of a source picture to account for offset or blurring effects.
rect
original source bounding rect
context
destination render context
modified bounding rect
sourceAsImage

briefdescription.para: Handles drawing of the effect's result on to the specified render context.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must reimplement this method to apply any transformations to the source QPicture and draw the result using the context's painter.
context
destination render context
drawSource

briefdescription.para: Specifies whether the glow is drawn outside the picture or within the picture.

simplesect.para: true if glow is to be drawn outside the picture, or false to draw glow within the picture

briefdescription.para: Base class for paint effect which draw a glow inside or outside a picture.
